snippet: An investigation in Sweden into Dr. Paolo Macchiarini, a pioneer in regenerative medicine, found he had omitted or falsified information about patients’ conditions in medical journals.
abstract: Investigation by Karolinska Institute in Stockholm, Sweden, accuses regenerative medicine pioneer, Dr Paolo Macchiarini, of fabricating or falsifying data in major medical journal articles, including 2011 report in The Lancet; inquiry, prompted by complaints of four doctors treating three patients who underwent windpipe replacement surgery by Macchiarini, accuses surgeon of reporting inaccurate and misleading information about their prognosis and procedure's overall success.
lead_paragraph: An investigation in Sweden into Dr. Paolo Macchiarini, a pioneer in regenerative medicine, found he had omitted or falsified information about patients’ conditions in medical journals.

headline.main: Inquiry Finds Misconduct by a Top Surgeon, Paolo Macchiarini
headline.print_headline: Top Transplant Surgeon Faked Data, Inquiry Finds
